scripts.deploy:clean: rm -rf dist && npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://www.potacademy.net --delete --region ap-east-1 --exclude '*.jsx' && find dist/assets -name '*.js' | while IFS= read -r file; do aws s3 cp "$file" "s3://www.potacademy.net/${file#dist/}" --content-type 'application/javascript' --cache-control 'public,max-age=31536000' --region ap-east-1; done && aws s3 cp dist/index.html s3://www.potacademy.net/index.html --content-type 'text/html' --cache-control 'no-cache' --region ap-east-1
